title: My Small Vayne montage! :) please watch if you like!

embed.description: Hi! quick video with mini plays ok big thanks to Frank for helping with the programs CreatorSuite ect... im aware of the song switch... ショート SONGS: - [EDM] - Rootkit - Carry Me Away [Monstercat Release] - Salvatore - Dive (feat. Enya & Alex Aris) *I do not take any ownership of music displayed in this video.

replies.body:
ok im being critical here; it was still a somewhat decent video

- 30 second intro nearly made me kill myself. Your quite addicted to the baron pit camera panning get up, i suggest you cut back on it just a tad. Like yeah cool circling on vaynes model on a vayne clip thats what i came for.

- Why is half the screen cut off with black bars???. nearly all of the hud is gone and the top half of the screen too. feel like im watching a vcr or some shit. Please either render it to a different resolution or edit this aspect differently. 

- That random ass music change halfway through was completely out of the blue and a massive boner kill. 

i know its a short montage but yeah, nearly a quarter of your video was your intro alone. just tips for the future my man :)

EDIT: just saw this was three months ago lmao. regardless, i can see from your most recent video your editing skills have improved. just keep these points in mind
really enjoyed this good first montage
